name: LevelHome
0:
”Alexa, unlock the front door”
”Alexa, is the front door locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to control your Level Bolt or Level Lock with your voice.

Alexa allows you to:
- Lock/unlock your door
- Check your lock's current status

To unlock your door, just set a 4-digit code in the Alexa app. Go to the Smart Home section, select your Level Lock, and enable the "Unlock by voice" and '4-digit voice code' settings.

Connecting Level products to Alexa
Find more information about connecting Level devices at https://level.co/support/sections/1500001761721

Required Level Products
- To control a Level Lock with Alexa, you'll need the Level Bolt or Level Lock and a compatible Amazon Sidewalk hub. 

Additional Support
For additional help, please visit http://level.co/support
